mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.email, u.name, u.phone, u.password, u.nickname, u.address, u.birth_date, u.points, u.rating, u.receive_mail, u.email_verified, u.created_at, u.updated_at, r.role_name FROM user u JOIN user_role r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE u.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, name, phone, password, nickname, address, birth_date, receive_mail, email_verified) VALUES(#{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{birthDate}, #{receiveMail}, #{emailVerified})
